bkb_current_name.label: User Name
bkb_current_name.tooltip:
Username of the current king.
ONLY USE LOWERCASE LETTERS AND _

bkb_current_display.label: Display Name
bkb_current_display.tooltip:
Display name of the current king.
Can contain unicode characters.

bkb_current_hp.label: Health
bkb_current_hp.tooltip: Health of the current king, cannot exceed set maximum health.

bkb_current_mhp.label: Maximum Health
bkb_current_mhp.tooltip: Maximum health of the current king.

bkb_current_shield.label: Shield Durability
bkb_current_shield.tooltip: Shield durability of the current king.

bkb_current_mshield.label: Maximum Shield Durability
bkb_current_mshield.tooltip: Maximum shield durability of the current king.

bkb_current_avataruri.label: Avatar Uri
bkb_current_avataruri.tooltip:
Twitch Avatar Uri of the current king.
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET!

bkb_new_hp.label: Health
bkb_new_hp.tooltip:
Health of the new king, cannot exceed set maximum health.
In 'Overkill Mode' and 'Strength Mode' this value is ignored.

bkb_new_mhp.label: Maximum Health
bkb_new_mhp.tooltip:
Maximum health of the new king.
In 'Overkill Mode' this value is added to the overkill value.
In 'Strength Mode' this acts as minimum health value.

bkb_new_shield.label: Shield Durability
bkb_new_shield.tooltip:
Shield durability of the new king.
In 'Shield Mode' this value is ignored.

bkb_new_mode.label: Mode
bkb_new_mode.tooltip:
[Shield] Exceeding damage done to previous king will be used as shield, that has to be broken first and can't be healed.
[Overkill] Exceeding damage will be added on top to the set base maximum health and is fully healed.
[Strength Mode] Total bits use will determain the new health, disregarding the previous king health.
[Fixed] New king will have fixed set values as health and shield.

bkb_other_critpercent.label: Critical Percentage
bkb_other_critpercent.tooltip:
Percentage that determines if the action will be a critical heal or damage. A shield break or kill is always considered critical, and therefore have their own outputs.
For critical damage the % of current health or shield durability.
For critical heal the % of the missing health.

bkb_chat_healnorm.label: Normal Heal Message
bkb_chat_healnorm.value: {name} healed up {healing} health with a {totalbits} health potion.
bkb_chat_healnorm.tooltip:
Message when current king heals.
{name} Healers Name
{healing} Total Healing
{totalbits} Total Bits Amount
{health} 'Before Healing' Health Value
{maxhealth} Maximum Health Value
{shield} Shield Durability
{newhealth} 'After Healing' Health Value

bkb_chat_healcrit.value: {name} critically healed up {healing} health with a {totalbits} health potion!

bkb_chat_killnormal.label: Kill While Unshielded Message
bkb_chat_killnormal.value: {combatiant} mustered up {totalbits} attack power to kill the defenceless {ckname} and successfully did so by dealing {dmgtotal} health damage!
bkb_chat_killnormal.tooltip:
Message when current king is killed while not shielded.
{combatiant} Attackers Name
{dmghealth} Health Damage
{dmgshield} Shield Damage
{dmgtotal} Total Damage
{totalbits} Total Bits Amount
{ckname} Current Kings Name
{ckhealth} Current Kings Health Value
{ckmaxhealth} Current Kings Max Health Value
{ckshield} Current Kings Shield Durability
{nkhealth} New Kings Health Value
{nkmaxhealth} New Kings Max Health Value
{nkshield} New Kings Shield Durability
